content.text:
[@elavoie](@IgYpd+tCtXnlE2tYX/8rR2AGt+P8svC98WH3MdYAa8Y=.ed25519) 

Yes! That's really great to hear. I fixed a [multiserver bug](https://github.com/ssbc/multiserver/pull/48) and Patchwork is currently using an [ssb-config workaround](https://github.com/ssbc/ssb-config/pull/53), but I'm hoping that once [the full fix](https://github.com/ssbc/multiserver/pull/49) is merged we won't need the workaround and SSB replication will work way more smoothly. I'm hoping other clients get these fixes soon too!
